column4: is there a way to fix a stubborn boot-time kernel panic (reiser corrupted?)?
ummmm. maybe, but not by mortal means. use a boot disk and try to recover that wya

hmm. first of all, do you have a seperate /boot partition or no?

who knows, reiserfs is wonky. I'd say yes. ;)
